generic_media.play_api.play.message: Error 500: Internal server error - Media playback failed unexpectedly.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The media service is currently offline.
Error 408: Request timeout - The request to play media timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You do not have permission to play this media.
Error 404: Not Found - The requested media content could not be found.

generic_media.search_api.search.message: Error 500: Internal server error - The media search could not be completed.
Error 503: Service unavailable - Could not connect to the media search service.
Error 408: Request timeout - The media search request timed out.
Error 403: Forbidden - You are not authorized to use the media search feature.
Error 400: Bad Request - The search query was invalid or improperly formatted.
